examples: Anne was fond of Tim, though he often annoyed her.
Anne quería a Tim, aunque a menudo la molestaba.
Though she gave no sign, I was sure she had seen me.
Aunque no dio señales, estaba seguro de que me había visto.
His clothes, though old and worn, looked clean and of good quality.
Su ropa, aunque vieja y gastada, parecía limpia y de buena calidad.
Strange though it may sound, I was pleased it was over.
Por extraño que parezca, me alegré de que hubiera terminado.
